ğŸ“¦ Amazon Order Tracking Extractor

The Amazon Order Tracking Extractor is a simple tool that helps sellers quickly extract tracking numbers from Amazon Seller Central orders. This easy-to-use extension lets you input order IDs and automatically retrieves the tracking numbers, displaying them in a neat table for easy access. You can copy all tracking numbers with a single click for use in Google Sheets.

* ğŸ“‹ Easy Copying: Copy all tracking numbers with one click, formatted perfectly for Google Sheets.
* ğŸ”” Completion Alerts: Get a notification once all tracking numbers have been processed.

         Click "Start Extraction" to begin the process.
* ğŸš€ The extension will extract the tracking numbers and display them in a table.
* âœ… Once completed, you'll receive a notification.
* ğŸ“‘ Use the "Copy Tracking Numbers" button to copy and paste the data into Google Sheets 
         (each tracking number will be placed in its own column).
